snippet: Laurent Le Bon, who currently heads the Centre Pompidou-Metz, was named president, replacing Anne Baldassari, who was dismissed from the position last month.
abstract: Laurent Le Bon, who currently heads the Centre Pompidou-Metz, was named president, replacing Anne Baldassari, who was dismissed from the position last month.

headline.main: Musée Picasso in Paris Names New President
headline.print_headline: Picasso Museum in Paris Names New President
